news.title: How thousands of ‘overworked, underpaid’ humans train Google’s AI to seem smart
news.summary: Rachael Sawyer, a technical writer from Texas, received a LinkedIn message from a recruiter hiring for a vague title of writing analyst. On her first day of work a week later, however, her expectations went bust. Her job was to rate and moderate the content created by artificial intelligence.

news.title: Larry Ellison: Oracle co-founder who overtook Musk as world’s richest person
news.summary: Ellison's net worth shot up to $393bn , surpassing Musk’s $384bn – although, by the time markets closed on Wednesday, Musk was back ahead. Ellison is friend of Trump, owner of Hawaii island and father of man who took over CBS.

news.title: French lawmaker calls for criminal inquiry into TikTok’s effect on children
news.summary: Socialist MP Arthur Delaporte said he co-chaired a six-month French parliamentary inquiry into TikTok’s psychological effects on minors. He heard testimony from families, social media executives and influencers.

news.title: The best iPhones in 2025: which Apple smartphone is right for you, according to our expert
news.summary: The best iPhone may be the one you already own. There is generally no need to buy a fresh phone just because new models have been released. There’s more to choose from in the Apple ecosystem than you may expect.

news.title: EA Sports FC 26 preview – new play styles aim to tackle Fifa challenge
news.summary: EA has set up a new Player Feedback Portal, as well as a dedicated Discord channel. The developer has also introduced AI-powered social listening tools to monitor EA Sports FC chatter across various platforms including X, Instagram and YouTube.
